title: Home of the Unusual Creatures - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Apartment Life   Cheats   Fantasy Creatures   Ghosts   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 木作舟
description:
Dawn inherited the rental house left by his deceased parents, ideally, he wants to be a small homeowner that’s able to enjoy life until his time comes.

But why was his tenants a bunch of monsters?

A mysterious pendant, a group of supernatural creatures from all sorts of places and times, and he himself a non so ordinary landlord.

“I know, from the very moment I promised to let you all stay, my daily routine was destined to be not so ordinary anymore.”

 >
